message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"to be; is, am, are","sentence":"我是学生。","image_prompt":"A young person standing with a backpack, pointing to themselves and smiling, in front of a faded cityscape showing subtle signs of an apocalypse (cracks in the pavement, a few fallen signs), rendered in soft animated style with warm, subdued colors.","sentence_translation":"I am a student."}
